title: karuNai puri
sahitya:
karuNai puri kapAli oru gatiyillAda Ezhai enak-kuLLam irangi


anupallavi

  aruL nidhiyena aru maraigaLum munivarum
anboDunnaip-pugazhvadu poyyAgAmal


caraNam    OyAda nOyAl uDal nondiDa pEdai uLLam unnai marandiDa
uyir vAzhvu vEmbAi kashandiDa varumaippEyum ennaith-toDarndiDa
mAyA prapancattil Ashai viDAduyir vAdi UshalADa sheyal
maranduDal taLarndu taLLADum aDimaikku manamirangi abhayam tara vandaruL
